Pre-Game Insights: The USA will try to keep making history in the tournament, as it's the first time they make it to the event's quarterfinals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The USA earned a ticket to the knockout stages after finishing in Group A's second spot, with five points, two behind leaders India.
Others: The game between the USA and South Africa will be played on Wednesday, 19 June 2024. Start time is scheduled for 10.30 a.m. ET/ 7.30 a.m. PT.
You can watch a live stream of the game on fuboTV (free trial available).
If you are in the US, you can watch the game on Sling, and Willow TV.
